panels.title: Debugging Your Running: Converting Data to Insight

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM runs WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) as total FROM runs WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT SUM(distance_km) * 0.621371 as miles FROM runs WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(distance_km) * 0.621371 as miles FROM runs WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT (SUM(distance_km) * 0.621371) / ((julianday(MAX(date)) - julianday(MIN(date))) / 7) as weekly_avg FROM runs WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT (SUM(distance_km) * 0.621371) / ((julianday(MAX(date)) - julianday(MIN(date))) / 7) as weekly_avg FROM runs WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT AVG(pace_min_km) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT AVG(pace_min_km) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

panels.title: Row 1: Was the Easy Run Actually Too Hard?

panels.description: Dots above the trendline = working harder than pace suggests

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT pace_min_km, avg_hr, name, date FROM runs WHERE avg_hr IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY pace_min_km
targets.rawSql: SELECT pace_min_km, avg_hr, name, date FROM runs WHERE avg_hr IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY pace_min_km

panels.title: Effort vs Pace (HR by Pace)

panels.description: Relative effort over time - higher values indicate harder perceived effort (capped at 200)

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT julianday(date) - julianday(date((SELECT MIN(date) FROM runs WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')))) as day_num, relative_effort, name, date FROM runs WHERE relative_effort IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY date
targets.rawSql: SELECT julianday(date) - julianday(date((SELECT MIN(date) FROM runs WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')))) as day_num, relative_effort, name, date FROM runs WHERE relative_effort IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY date

panels.title: System Stress Over Time

panels.description: Most runs should be easy (relative effort < 100). Green = easy, Red = hard

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT relative_effort FROM runs WHERE relative_effort IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT relative_effort FROM runs WHERE relative_effort IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

panels.title: Stress Distribution
Row 2: Did the Weather Wreck Me?

panels.description: Expect ~5 sec/km slower per 5C above 15C

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT temp_c, pace_min_km, name, date FROM runs WHERE temp_c IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY temp_c
targets.rawSql: SELECT temp_c, pace_min_km, name, date FROM runs WHERE temp_c IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY temp_c

panels.title: Temperature vs Pace

panels.description: Same pace, higher HR in heat

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT temp_c, avg_hr, name, date FROM runs WHERE temp_c IS NOT NULL AND avg_hr IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY temp_c
targets.rawSql: SELECT temp_c, avg_hr, name, date FROM runs WHERE temp_c IS NOT NULL AND avg_hr IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY temp_c

panels.title: Temperature vs HR

panels.description: High humidity = slower runs

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT humidity, pace_min_km, name, date FROM runs WHERE humidity IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY humidity
targets.rawSql: SELECT humidity, pace_min_km, name, date FROM runs WHERE humidity IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY humidity

panels.title: Humidity vs Pace

panels.description: Find the sweet spot zone for optimal running conditions (color = pace)

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT temp_c, humidity, pace_min_km, name, date FROM runs WHERE temp_c IS NOT NULL AND humidity IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY temp_c
targets.rawSql: SELECT temp_c, humidity, pace_min_km, name, date FROM runs WHERE temp_c IS NOT NULL AND humidity IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY temp_c

panels.title: Weather: Temp vs Humidity
Row 3: Did the Trail Just Suck?

panels.description: More climbing = slower (but by how much?)

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT elevation_gain, pace_min_km, name, date FROM runs WHERE elevation_gain IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY elevation_gain
targets.rawSql: SELECT elevation_gain, pace_min_km, name, date FROM runs WHERE elevation_gain IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY elevation_gain

panels.title: Elevation Gain vs Pace

panels.description: Quantify the hill tax

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN elevation_gain < 50 THEN 'Flat (<50m)' WHEN elevation_gain < 100 THEN 'Rolling (50-100m)' ELSE 'Hilly (>100m)' END as terrain, ROUND(AVG(pace_min_km), 2) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE elevation_gain IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY CASE WHEN elevation_gain < 50 THEN 1 WHEN elevation_gain < 100 THEN 2 ELSE 3 END ORDER BY 1
targets.rawSql: SELECT CASE WHEN elevation_gain < 50 THEN 'Flat (<50m)' WHEN elevation_gain < 100 THEN 'Rolling (50-100m)' ELSE 'Hilly (>100m)' END as terrain, ROUND(AVG(pace_min_km), 2) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE elevation_gain IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY CASE WHEN elevation_gain < 50 THEN 1 WHEN elevation_gain < 100 THEN 2 ELSE 3 END ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Flat vs Hilly: The Hill Tax

panels.description: Sleep <70 = noticeable degradation?

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT sleep_score, pace_min_km, name, date FROM run_with_sleep WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND sleep_score IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sleep_score
targets.rawSql: SELECT sleep_score, pace_min_km, name, date FROM run_with_sleep WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND sleep_score IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL ORDER BY sleep_score

panels.title: Sleep Score vs Pace

panels.description: Low HRV = same pace feels harder

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT hrv, relative_effort, name, date FROM run_with_sleep WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND hrv IS NOT NULL AND relative_effort IS NOT NULL ORDER BY hrv
targets.rawSql: SELECT hrv, relative_effort, name, date FROM run_with_sleep WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND hrv IS NOT NULL AND relative_effort IS NOT NULL ORDER BY hrv

panels.title: HRV vs Relative Effort

panels.description: Trust the readiness score?

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT readiness_score, pace_min_km, name, date FROM run_with_sleep WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND readiness_score IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL ORDER BY readiness_score
targets.rawSql: SELECT readiness_score, pace_min_km, name, date FROM run_with_sleep WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND readiness_score IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL ORDER BY readiness_score

panels.title: Readiness Score vs Pace

panels.description: Deep sleep = better recovery?

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT deep_sleep_min, pace_min_km, name, date FROM run_with_sleep WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND deep_sleep_min IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL ORDER BY deep_sleep_min
targets.rawSql: SELECT deep_sleep_min, pace_min_km, name, date FROM run_with_sleep WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND deep_sleep_min IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL ORDER BY deep_sleep_min

panels.title: Deep Sleep vs Pace

panels.description: Weekly mileage - tracking training volume

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT strftime('%Y-W%W', MIN(date)) as week, ROUND(SUM(distance_km) * 0.621371, 1) as miles FROM runs WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%W', date) ORDER BY MIN(date)
targets.rawSql: SELECT strftime('%Y-W%W', MIN(date)) as week, ROUND(SUM(distance_km) * 0.621371, 1) as miles FROM runs WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%W', date) ORDER BY MIN(date)

panels.title: Weekly Mileage

panels.description: Monthly average pace - getting faster or slower?

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', MIN(date)) as month, ROUND(AVG(pace_min_km), 2) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%m', date) ORDER BY MIN(date)
targets.rawSql: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', MIN(date)) as month, ROUND(AVG(pace_min_km), 2) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%m', date) ORDER BY MIN(date)

panels.title: Monthly Pace Trend

panels.description: Top 5 fastest and slowest runs with conditions

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Fastest' as category, r.date, r.name, ROUND(r.pace_min_km, 2) as pace_min_km, ROUND(r.distance_km, 1) as distance_km, r.avg_hr, ROUND(r.temp_c, 1) as temp_c, r.weather, s.sleep_score, ROUND(r.elevation_gain, 0) as elevation_gain FROM runs r LEFT JOIN sleep s ON date(r.date) = s.date OR date(r.date, '-1 day') = s.date WHERE r.pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND r.distance_km > 3 AND r.date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND r.date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY r.pace_min_km ASC LIMIT 5) UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Slowest' as category, r.date, r.name, ROUND(r.pace_min_km, 2) as pace_min_km, ROUND(r.distance_km, 1) as distance_km, r.avg_hr, ROUND(r.temp_c, 1) as temp_c, r.weather, s.sleep_score, ROUND(r.elevation_gain, 0) as elevation_gain FROM runs r LEFT JOIN sleep s ON date(r.date) = s.date OR date(r.date, '-1 day') = s.date WHERE r.pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND r.distance_km > 3 AND r.date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND r.date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY r.pace_min_km DESC LIMIT 5)
targets.rawSql: SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Fastest' as category, r.date, r.name, ROUND(r.pace_min_km, 2) as pace_min_km, ROUND(r.distance_km, 1) as distance_km, r.avg_hr, ROUND(r.temp_c, 1) as temp_c, r.weather, s.sleep_score, ROUND(r.elevation_gain, 0) as elevation_gain FROM runs r LEFT JOIN sleep s ON date(r.date) = s.date OR date(r.date, '-1 day') = s.date WHERE r.pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND r.distance_km > 3 AND r.date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND r.date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY r.pace_min_km ASC LIMIT 5) UNION ALL SELECT * FROM (SELECT 'Slowest' as category, r.date, r.name, ROUND(r.pace_min_km, 2) as pace_min_km, ROUND(r.distance_km, 1) as distance_km, r.avg_hr, ROUND(r.temp_c, 1) as temp_c, r.weather, s.sleep_score, ROUND(r.elevation_gain, 0) as elevation_gain FROM runs r LEFT JOIN sleep s ON date(r.date) = s.date OR date(r.date, '-1 day') = s.date WHERE r.pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND r.distance_km > 3 AND r.date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND r.date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY r.pace_min_km DESC LIMIT 5)

panels.title: Best & Worst Runs

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM runs WHERE gels_estimated IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM runs WHERE gels_estimated IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT SUM(gels_estimated) FROM runs WHERE gels_estimated IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(gels_estimated) FROM runs WHERE gels_estimated IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT SUM(carbs_g) FROM runs WHERE carbs_g IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT SUM(carbs_g) FROM runs WHERE carbs_g IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

panels.description: Protocol: 1 gel (30g carbs) every 3 miles starting at mile 3

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT AVG(carbs_g * 4.0 / calories * 100) FROM runs WHERE carbs_g IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND calories > 0
targets.rawSql: SELECT AVG(carbs_g * 4.0 / calories * 100) FROM runs WHERE carbs_g IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND calories > 0

panels.title: Avg Carb Replacement %

panels.description: Carb intake vs calories burned on long runs

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CAST(ROUND(distance_km * 0.621371, 0) AS TEXT) || ' mi' as distance, ROUND(AVG(carbs_g * 4), 0) as carb_cals, ROUND(AVG(calories), 0) as burned FROM runs WHERE gels_estimated IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND calories > 0 GROUP BY ROUND(distance_km * 0.621371, 0) ORDER BY ROUND(distance_km * 0.621371, 0)
targets.rawSql: SELECT CAST(ROUND(distance_km * 0.621371, 0) AS TEXT) || ' mi' as distance, ROUND(AVG(carbs_g * 4), 0) as carb_cals, ROUND(AVG(calories), 0) as burned FROM runs WHERE gels_estimated IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND calories > 0 GROUP BY ROUND(distance_km * 0.621371, 0) ORDER BY ROUND(distance_km * 0.621371, 0)

panels.title: Carb Calories vs Total Burned

panels.description: All long runs with fueling estimates

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT date, name, ROUND(distance_km * 0.621371, 1) as miles, gels_estimated as gels, carbs_g as carbs, calories as burned, ROUND(carbs_g * 4.0 / calories * 100, 1) as replace_pct, ROUND(pace_min_km, 2) as pace FROM runs WHERE gels_estimated IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY date DESC
targets.rawSql: SELECT date, name, ROUND(distance_km * 0.621371, 1) as miles, gels_estimated as gels, carbs_g as carbs, calories as burned, ROUND(carbs_g * 4.0 / calories * 100, 1) as replace_pct, ROUND(pace_min_km, 2) as pace FROM runs WHERE gels_estimated IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY date DESC

panels.title: Long Run Fueling Log

panels.description: Does better fueling correlate with faster back-half paces?

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT gels_estimated as gels, pace_min_km as pace, name, date FROM runs WHERE gels_estimated IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY gels_estimated
targets.rawSql: SELECT gels_estimated as gels, pace_min_km as pace, name, date FROM runs WHERE gels_estimated IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY gels_estimated

panels.title: Gels vs Pace (Long Runs)

panels.description: Find your ideal running conditions by sleep and temperature

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT temp_c, sleep_score, pace_min_km, name, date FROM run_with_sleep WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND temp_c IS NOT NULL AND sleep_score IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL ORDER BY temp_c
targets.rawSql: SELECT temp_c, sleep_score, pace_min_km, name, date FROM run_with_sleep WHERE date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND temp_c IS NOT NULL AND sleep_score IS NOT NULL AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL ORDER BY temp_c

panels.title: Optimal Conditions (Temp x Sleep)

panels.description: Never run hard on Monday?

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT day_of_week, ROUND(AVG(pace_min_km), 2) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY day_of_week ORDER BY CASE day_of_week WHEN 'Monday' THEN 1 WHEN 'Tuesday' THEN 2 WHEN 'Wednesday' THEN 3 WHEN 'Thursday' THEN 4 WHEN 'Friday' THEN 5 WHEN 'Saturday' THEN 6 WHEN 'Sunday' THEN 7 END
targets.rawSql: SELECT day_of_week, ROUND(AVG(pace_min_km), 2) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY day_of_week ORDER BY CASE day_of_week WHEN 'Monday' THEN 1 WHEN 'Tuesday' THEN 2 WHEN 'Wednesday' THEN 3 WHEN 'Thursday' THEN 4 WHEN 'Friday' THEN 5 WHEN 'Saturday' THEN 6 WHEN 'Sunday' THEN 7 END

panels.title: Pace by Day of Week

panels.description: Morning vs afternoon runner?

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CASE WHEN hour_of_day < 6 THEN 'Early (0-6)' WHEN hour_of_day < 12 THEN 'Morning (6-12)' WHEN hour_of_day < 18 THEN 'Afternoon (12-18)' ELSE 'Evening (18-24)' END as time_of_day, ROUND(AVG(pace_min_km), 2) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY CASE WHEN hour_of_day < 6 THEN 1 WHEN hour_of_day < 12 THEN 2 WHEN hour_of_day < 18 THEN 3 ELSE 4 END ORDER BY 1
targets.rawSql: SELECT CASE WHEN hour_of_day < 6 THEN 'Early (0-6)' WHEN hour_of_day < 12 THEN 'Morning (6-12)' WHEN hour_of_day < 18 THEN 'Afternoon (12-18)' ELSE 'Evening (18-24)' END as time_of_day, ROUND(AVG(pace_min_km), 2) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY CASE WHEN hour_of_day < 6 THEN 1 WHEN hour_of_day < 12 THEN 2 WHEN hour_of_day < 18 THEN 3 ELSE 4 END ORDER BY 1

panels.title: Pace by Time of Day

panels.description: Which factors have the biggest impact on your pace? Positive = faster when factor is favorable

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT 'Cool Temp (<20C)' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE temp_c >= 20 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE temp_c < 20 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact UNION ALL SELECT 'Good Sleep (>75)' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM run_with_sleep WHERE sleep_score <= 75 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM run_with_sleep WHERE sleep_score > 75 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact UNION ALL SELECT 'Flat Route (<50m)' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE elevation_gain >= 50 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE elevation_gain < 50 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact UNION ALL SELECT 'Low Humidity (<70%)' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE humidity >= 70 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE humidity < 70 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact UNION ALL SELECT 'High HRV (>40)' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM run_with_sleep WHERE hrv <= 40 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM run_with_sleep WHERE hrv > 40 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact ORDER BY impact DESC
targets.rawSql: SELECT 'Cool Temp (<20C)' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE temp_c >= 20 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE temp_c < 20 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact UNION ALL SELECT 'Good Sleep (>75)' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM run_with_sleep WHERE sleep_score <= 75 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM run_with_sleep WHERE sleep_score > 75 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact UNION ALL SELECT 'Flat Route (<50m)' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE elevation_gain >= 50 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE elevation_gain < 50 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact UNION ALL SELECT 'Low Humidity (<70%)' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE humidity >= 70 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE humidity < 70 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact UNION ALL SELECT 'High HRV (>40)' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM run_with_sleep WHERE hrv <= 40 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM run_with_sleep WHERE hrv > 40 AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact ORDER BY impact DESC

panels.title: What Actually Matters (Pace Impact)

panels.description: Monthly Easy Zone % trend - target is 80% (SLO line shown)

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', MIN(date)) as month, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_1_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_2_sec, 0)) / SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_1_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_2_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_3_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_4_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_5_sec, 0)), 1) as easy_pct FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%m', date) ORDER BY MIN(date)
targets.rawSql: SELECT strftime('%Y-%m', MIN(date)) as month, ROUND(100.0 * SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_1_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_2_sec, 0)) / SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_1_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_2_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_3_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_4_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_5_sec, 0)), 1) as easy_pct FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%m', date) ORDER BY MIN(date)

panels.title: 80/20 Trend (Easy Zone %)

panels.description: Aerobic training effect over time (0-5 scale)

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT julianday(date) - julianday((SELECT MIN(date) FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch'))) as day_num, aerobic_te, name, date FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND aerobic_te IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date
targets.rawSql: SELECT julianday(date) - julianday((SELECT MIN(date) FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch'))) as day_num, aerobic_te, name, date FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND aerobic_te IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date

panels.title: Processing Efficiency Score

panels.description: VO2max estimate over time - higher is better

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT julianday(date) - julianday((SELECT MIN(date) FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch'))) as day_num, vo2max, name, date FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND vo2max IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date
targets.rawSql: SELECT julianday(date) - julianday((SELECT MIN(date) FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch'))) as day_num, vo2max, name, date FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') AND vo2max IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date

panels.title: System Capacity Trend (VO2max)

panels.description: Average running dynamics metrics from Garmin

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT 'Ground Contact (ms)' as metric, ROUND(AVG(avg_ground_contact_time), 0) as value FROM runs WHERE avg_ground_contact_time IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') UNION ALL SELECT 'Stride Length (cm)' as metric, ROUND(AVG(avg_stride_length), 1) as value FROM runs WHERE avg_stride_length IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') UNION ALL SELECT 'Vertical Osc (cm)' as metric, ROUND(AVG(avg_vertical_oscillation), 1) as value FROM runs WHERE avg_vertical_oscillation IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') UNION ALL SELECT 'Avg Power (W)' as metric, ROUND(AVG(avg_power), 0) as value FROM runs WHERE avg_power IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT 'Ground Contact (ms)' as metric, ROUND(AVG(avg_ground_contact_time), 0) as value FROM runs WHERE avg_ground_contact_time IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') UNION ALL SELECT 'Stride Length (cm)' as metric, ROUND(AVG(avg_stride_length), 1) as value FROM runs WHERE avg_stride_length IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') UNION ALL SELECT 'Vertical Osc (cm)' as metric, ROUND(AVG(avg_vertical_oscillation), 1) as value FROM runs WHERE avg_vertical_oscillation IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') UNION ALL SELECT 'Avg Power (W)' as metric, ROUND(AVG(avg_power), 0) as value FROM runs WHERE avg_power IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

panels.title: Runtime Performance Metrics

panels.description: How much energy each run drains from body battery

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT distance_km, body_battery_change, name, date FROM runs WHERE body_battery_change IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY distance_km
targets.rawSql: SELECT distance_km, body_battery_change, name, date FROM runs WHERE body_battery_change IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY distance_km

panels.title: Resource Depletion Under Load

panels.description: Weekly training intensity distribution - how polarized is your training?

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT strftime('%Y-%W', date) as week, SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_1_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_2_sec, 0)) / 3600.0 as easy_hrs, SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_3_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_4_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_5_sec, 0)) / 3600.0 as hard_hrs FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%W', date) ORDER BY week
targets.rawSql: SELECT strftime('%Y-%W', date) as week, SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_1_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_2_sec, 0)) / 3600.0 as easy_hrs, SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_3_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_4_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_5_sec, 0)) / 3600.0 as hard_hrs FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY strftime('%Y-%W', date) ORDER BY week

panels.title: Load Distribution by Zone

panels.description: Garmin run count with matched data

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

panels.title: Total System Logs

panels.description: Current VO2max estimate from Garmin

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT vo2max FROM runs WHERE vo2max IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1
targets.rawSql: SELECT vo2max FROM runs WHERE vo2max IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 1

panels.title: Max System Capacity

panels.description: Average training load per run

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT AVG(training_load) FROM runs WHERE training_load IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT AVG(training_load) FROM runs WHERE training_load IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

panels.title: Avg System Load

panels.description: Percentage of running time in easy zones (should be 80%)

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT 100.0 * SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_1_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_2_sec, 0)) / SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_1_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_2_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_3_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_4_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_5_sec, 0)) FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT 100.0 * SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_1_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_2_sec, 0)) / SUM(COALESCE(hr_zone_1_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_2_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_3_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_4_sec, 0) + COALESCE(hr_zone_5_sec, 0)) FROM runs WHERE garmin_id IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

panels.title: Easy Zone % (SLO: 80%)

panels.description: Comparing January (no alcohol) vs other months - 3 years of Dry January data

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT 'Dry January Effect' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE strftime('%m', date) != '01' AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE strftime('%m', date) = '01' AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact
targets.rawSql: SELECT 'Dry January Effect' as factor, ROUND((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE strftime('%m', date) != '01' AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km)*60 FROM runs WHERE strftime('%m', date) = '01' AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 1) as impact

panels.title: Was It The Beer?

panels.description: Average pace by month - January highlighted

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT CASE strftime('%m', date) WHEN '01' THEN 'Jan' WHEN '02' THEN 'Feb' WHEN '03' THEN 'Mar' WHEN '04' THEN 'Apr' WHEN '05' THEN 'May' WHEN '06' THEN 'Jun' WHEN '07' THEN 'Jul' WHEN '08' THEN 'Aug' WHEN '09' THEN 'Sep' WHEN '10' THEN 'Oct' WHEN '11' THEN 'Nov' WHEN '12' THEN 'Dec' END as month, ROUND(AVG(pace_min_km), 2) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY strftime('%m', date) ORDER BY strftime('%m', date)
targets.rawSql: SELECT CASE strftime('%m', date) WHEN '01' THEN 'Jan' WHEN '02' THEN 'Feb' WHEN '03' THEN 'Mar' WHEN '04' THEN 'Apr' WHEN '05' THEN 'May' WHEN '06' THEN 'Jun' WHEN '07' THEN 'Jul' WHEN '08' THEN 'Aug' WHEN '09' THEN 'Sep' WHEN '10' THEN 'Oct' WHEN '11' THEN 'Nov' WHEN '12' THEN 'Dec' END as month, ROUND(AVG(pace_min_km), 2) as avg_pace FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') GROUP BY strftime('%m', date) ORDER BY strftime('%m', date)

panels.title: Pace by Month (January = Dry)

panels.description: Sleep quality comparison - does no alcohol improve sleep?

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT 'January (Dry)' as period, ROUND(AVG(sleep_score), 1) as avg_sleep FROM sleep WHERE strftime('%m', date) = '01' AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') UNION ALL SELECT 'Other Months' as period, ROUND(AVG(sleep_score), 1) as avg_sleep FROM sleep WHERE strftime('%m', date) != '01' AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')
targets.rawSql: SELECT 'January (Dry)' as period, ROUND(AVG(sleep_score), 1) as avg_sleep FROM sleep WHERE strftime('%m', date) = '01' AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch') UNION ALL SELECT 'Other Months' as period, ROUND(AVG(sleep_score), 1) as avg_sleep FROM sleep WHERE strftime('%m', date) != '01' AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')

panels.title: Sleep: Dry vs Wet Months

panels.description: Performance cost of alcohol - January (dry) vs other months

targets.rawQueryText: SELECT ROUND(100.0 * ((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km) FROM runs WHERE strftime('%m', date) != '01' AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km) FROM runs WHERE strftime('%m', date) = '01' AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch'))) / (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km) FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 2) as pct
targets.rawSql: SELECT ROUND(100.0 * ((SELECT AVG(pace_min_km) FROM runs WHERE strftime('%m', date) != '01' AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')) - (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km) FROM runs WHERE strftime('%m', date) = '01' AND pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch'))) / (SELECT AVG(pace_min_km) FROM runs WHERE pace_min_km IS NOT NULL AND date >= date($__from/1000, 'unixepoch') AND date <= date($__to/1000, 'unixepoch')), 2) as pct

panels.title: Alcohol Impact %
